channel.title: Need help to make your own commands
channel.description: hi, can anyone help with howto make your own commands i want to add ::train. i know that i need to add somthing in client.java but where in client.java ty.

item.title: Need help to make your own commands
item.dc:creator: @MladenJ MladenJ
item.description:
@MladenJ wrote:

[code]
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“train2”))
{
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); //made by Musicmad441
}
else
{
teleportToX = 2911;
teleportToY = 3610;
sendMessage(“You teleport to the second training area.”);
sendMessage(“Kill the mages for a key then use on the chest to get runes food and arrows.”);
}
}

[/code]
